title: Facebook and Instagram are back up after some users experienced issues
text: Many users reported missing images on the platforms.

title: Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg urges people to complete the US Census online
text: The social network is directing users to the Census Bureau's website.

title: Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg on coronavirus information: 'We take our responsibility seriously'
text: Facebook's Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg joins Yahoo Finance's Influencers with Andy Serwer to discuss Facebook's responsibility to post accurate information during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook's Sandberg: Learning from our mistakes prepared us to deal with the coronavirus
text: Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg on Wednesday said the company's lessons learned from its numerous mistakes over the past couple of years has prepared it to deal with the crises caused by the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook May Be Hit Harder Than You Think by COVID-19
text: The coronavirus isn't going to spare this tech giant.

title: Facebook and Google Seek to Delay Paying India's Digital Tax
text: At least a six-month deferment sought.

title: Are the FAANG Stocks on Sale During the Coronavirus Crisis?
text: With the sudden bear market in US stocks, could your favorite large cap growth stocks suddenly be true value stocks?

title: Here's Why Facebook's Investing Another $100 Million in Local Journalism

title: Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg talks about helping small businesses and news organizations
text: Chief Operating Officer of Facebook Sheryl Sandberg speaks with Yahoo Finance's Editor-in-Chief Andy Serwer about Facebook's focus on small business and news organizations.

title: Better Buy: Facebook  vs. Twitter
text: These social media titans are pursuing divergent strategies for growing their businesses. As a result, one is a better buy.
